oai_dc:dc.dc:title: NUMERICAL CALCULATION OF SEICHE MOTIONS IN HARBOURS OF ARBITRARY SHAPE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gaillard, P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: seiching
numerical calculation
harbor
harbor seiching
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A new method of calculation of wave diffraction around islands, offshore structures, and of long wave oscillations within offshore or shore-connected harbours is presented. The method is a combination of the finite element technique with an analytical representation of the wave pattern in the far field. Examples of application are given, and results are compared with other theoretical and experimental investigations.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 18 (1982): Proceedings of 18th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Cape Town, South Africa, 1982.; 11
